Class XboxController.Trigger

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable
    Enclosing class:
    XboxController

    public static class XboxController.Trigger
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button
    This class is used to represent one of the two Triggers on an Xbox360 controller.
